heisigStory: Good sand for beaches has few or no stones in it. That means that all of us whose feet have been spoiled by too much time in shoes don't have to watch our step as we cavort about.
koohiiStory1: Here´s how I remember that stone is on the left. This is because sand starts as stones, and only later they become few.
koohiiStory2: In good SAND, stones are few, if any.
readingExamples: 砂丘 (さきゅう), 砂糖 (さとう), 砂 (すな)
words:
砂利(じゃり): gravel, ballast, pebbles
砂漠(さばく): desert
砂(すな): sand
砂糖(さとう): sugar
